biography_text: TRONE, David, a Representative from Maryland; born in Cheverly, Prince Georgeâs County, Md., September 21, 1955; B.A., Furman University, Greenville, S.C., 1977; M.B.A., University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, Pa., 1985; business owner; unsuccessful candidate for nomination to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress in 2016; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
